description:
Riley Price is that guy. You know that guy. The one who has had a little too much to drink and may or may not be in a position to make sound decisions. Seems he's gotten himself all shitfaced with nowhere to go come Last Call. Luckily, Marcus Mojo knows how to deal with guys like this. Being a bartender at a club, it's pretty much par for the course every night to deal with someone like Riley, so Marcus pretty much has his method down pat. First he offers to help the guy out the door. If he can make it, good for him. He's on his way to a new adventure. But if he can't stand on his own two feet... well that's when things begin to get interesting. You see, Marcus has no problem accommodating a random drunk guy, provided that the random drunk guy has no problem 'accommodating' Marcus. And by that, of course, I mean deep throating his cock, rimming his hole and pounding his ass until they both cum like crazy!

Enjoy!
title: Last Call
